issue.title: Trusty: remote_endpoint: Transport endpoint is not connected

content.raw: Into /usr/local you should only have from build installation, packages should always go to /usr. Please be sure that you remove all previous compilations (cd gazebo/build && make uninstall) so you won't have anything related to gazebo in /usr/local.
content.html: Into /usr/local you should only have from build installation, packages should always go to /usr. Please be sure that you remove all previous compilations (cd gazebo/build && make uninstall) so you won't have anything related to gazebo in /usr/local.
